error.signature: cannot assign to struct field in map
error.regex: cannot assign to struct field in map

verdict.summary: Go doesn't allow modifying a struct field directly through a map access because map values are not addressable.

dead_ends.action: Using reflect to modify the field
Using unsafe.Pointer to get the address
dead_ends.why_fails: Map values may move during rehashing; undefined behavior

workarounds.action: Copy the struct, modify it, and assign back: v := m[key]; v.Field = x; m[key] = v
workarounds.how: The idiomatic Go pattern for map-of-structs modification

workarounds.action: Use a map of pointers instead: map[Key]*Struct
workarounds.how: Pointer values are addressable; fields can be modified directly: m[key].Field = x
